content:
I've added a new reminder for Wednesdays at 8:15 AM:

* Wednesday: 8:15 AM - "Mindful morning: meditate and plan out your day"

This reminder will help you make the most of your later start on Wednesdays, and ensure you prioritize your mindfulness and task planning.

Here's the updated reminder schedule:

* Monday: 6:45 AM - "Time to get ready for morning jog!"
* Tuesday: 6:45 AM - "Get moving! Morning jog time"
* Wednesday: 8:15 AM - "Mindful morning: meditate and plan out your day"
* Thursday: 6:45 AM - "Rise and shine! Morning jog awaits"

Let me know if you need any further assistance or have any other reminders you'd like to add!
